page.title: 06East Kilbride Town Centre
page.content: As well as having smaller shopping centres in each of the neighbourhoods East Kilbride also has a main shopping area at the Town Centre with parking available free at the multi-storey in- door car-park or any of the four large outdoor spaces. The shopping area is completely pedestrianised with well designed shopping malls (featured recently in the BBC serial "The Mad Death") accounting for a large per- centage of the 1 million sq.ft. of shopping space. The shops themselves cater for all tastes ranging from national multiples to the smaller exclusive specialist shops and high fashion boutiques. At the Town Centre area is also to be found the main library, a dual cinema, an entertain- ment complex with roller discos, an Olympic-size swimming pool and a youth centre.
